categories.name: I cannot find emails in my email client
categories.hint: For example, missing old emails or not receiving new emails

categories.name: I am not able to send emails
Bridge is not starting correctly
categories.hint: For example, Bridge does not autostart or shows an error at startup

categories.name: Bridge is running slow
categories.hint: For example, delay in receiving email or high resource consumption

questions.text: Please describe what happened and include any error messages.
What did you want or expect to happen?
What were the step-by-step actions you took that led to this happening?
When did the issue last occur? Is it repeating?
Are you running any of these software? Select all that apply.
Are you missing emails from the email client or not receiving new ones?
Can you find the emails in the web/mobile application?
Which of these issues are you experiencing?
answerList: Bridge is slowing down my computer
